Author: jl777c#5810
Content: everybody got special tx 1) (the dust) and it is up to each user to send it to the proper claim address

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if it doesnt match, then it becomes disputed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this is how we prevent the hacker from making a false claim

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but it means you MUST make your claim ASAP if you havent, as the hacker could make a claim and if you dont claim, then it wont be disputed
